text: phir hamane is kitaab ka uttaraadhikaaree un logon ko banaaya, jinhen hamane apane bando mein se chun liya hai. ab koee to unamen se apane aap par zulm karata hai aur koee unamen se madhy shrenee ka hai aur koee unamen se allaah ke krpaayog se bhalaiyon mein agrasar hai. yahee hai badee shreshthata.
